data.title: Living a Dream
data.text:
2005 studio album by Katherine Jenkins

Living a DreamStudio album by Released31 October 2005 ( )Recorded2005GenreClassical crossoverLabelUniversal Classics and JazzKatherine Jenkins chronology

Second Nature

(2004) Living a Dream

(2005) Serenade

(2006)

Professional ratingsReview scoresSourceRatingmusicOMH(Positive)[1]

Living a Dream is the third album by Welsh mezzo-soprano Katherine Jenkins, released on 31 October 2005, in the UK. It charted at number 4 on the UK Albums Chart[2] and at number 1 on the UK Classical Album Chart.[3]

"I Vow to Thee My Country"

"All Things Bright and Beautiful"

"Mon cœur s'ouvre à ta voix"

"Over the Rainbow"

"Torna a Surriento"

"Do Not Stand At My Grave And Weep"

"We'll Meet Again"
